Text:
From the installer:
"Red Alert: A Path Beyond Beta Patch 1 has made the following changes:

-Problem where program would hang on startup has been minimized
-Service Depots not deactivating on certain maps once destroyed has been fixed
-Attack power for Allied Anti-Tank weaponry (Light Tank, Medium Tank, Rocket Soldier) increased slightly
-Tesla Coil attack power increased, reload time doubled (one bolt will now kill any infantry in one hit)

NOTICE:
If you've been having problems with kill message icons being truncated, please check the "Alternate Kill Message Strings" install option, which will replace the kill message symbols with text."
